data.text: @DC_Entropy @ButlerLikeASir (( Jesus that's sad as fuck....but I love  that Idea!))

@DC_Entropy @ButlerLikeASir ((Oh no I absolutely loved that scene it was perfect. I just mean how he swings his arms out to his side just looked awkward  compared to how we see him run in everything else.
@DC_Entropy @ButlerLikeASir in the comics. I loved Ezra as a young innocent Barry. But it lacked how fast he learns and adapts as The Flash.

@DC_Entropy @ButlerLikeASir ((I'm hopeful flash point will fix everything. I think they tried to set up to much. Even flashes running. He looked so awkward that i figured they're going to explain how he hasn't trained to run or fight and he will instead of just making him adapt to his powers like he does+

@DC_Entropy @ButlerLikeASir I feel like bvs gave a lot of great opportunists but fell short due to editing. From my understanding it caused huge plot holes that they just never addressed. But from the sounds of it Snyder is out and we'll get the truth soon.

@DC_Entropy @ButlerLikeASir ((From what I've heard steppenwolf was going to take control of supes and bruce was going to send barry back in time to warn him to use lois to bring him back which would bring in the black suit to mark his true return as Superman. But all that was cut.
@DC_Entropy @ButlerLikeASir ((Same actually, I would also love internal dialogue like they do in the comics. They got close in bvs. But not close enough.

@DC_Entropy @ButlerLikeASir ((I did enjoy aquaman in the film. It feels like he's very early on in his life before becoming The Aquaman. I'm excited for his character development and the seriousness that should come along with it.
@DC_Entropy @ButlerLikeASir missing for me. :( I just want bvs bats back. He's supposed to have that dark tone while the other bring the light. but thats just my opinion.

@DC_Entropy @ButlerLikeASir ((They could have utilized him far more. He should be able to take out multiple parademons at once not have trouble with just one. He's a master tactician  he should be able to access a situation in seconds and act. I felt like that was the main part of the character that was+

@DC_Entropy @ButlerLikeASir + I love Ben as Batman. I think the thing that messed with Justice league was the rush to get it finished. I still enjoyed it just seemed off in ways. I don't want to see Ben replaced cuz of it.

@DC_Entropy @ButlerLikeASir True but the delivery didn't feel like Batman. It lacked bens tone from the previous movie. Too much eye contact and shrugs from bats. Even in the animated series he's still stand offish and his jokes are kept closer to his personality than what it was in Justice League. +
@ButlerLikeASir /I'm skeptical of the Flahspoint adaptation. They'll probably use it to correct their mistakes.
@BrandedByBats /I'm even more shocked they are actually making flashpoint. If they do it right it could be really amazing. Yeah I'll miss Ben)

@ButlerLikeASir ((Sadly bats was nothing like his portrayal in bvs. way more jokey and punny. It was sad to see. Also I don't think he's quitting but more of being ushered out. Rumor is Matt Reeves wan'ts to recast for his trilogy. I just hope they don't bring the black suit back.
@ButlerLikeASir //Apparently, he is quitting the role after Flashpoint. Such a shame. I enjoyed his work on BVS.
